pageContext.claim: “So, Angela [Merkel] was a superstar until she allowed millions of people to come into Germany. That really hurt her badly as you know. She was unbeatable in any election. She allowed millions of people to come in.”
pageContext.analysis: Merkel is more popular among Germans than Trump is among Americans, according to some polls. To say Germany has accepted "millions" of immigrants is an exaggeration. German data show that from 2015, when the European refugee crisis began, to 2017, the country accepted less than 1.5 million.
